 16 
 17 /**
 18  * @class CSS 3D Transform-based renderer.
 19  * @param {HTMLElement} _container the HTML container element for the render viewport
 20  *
 21  * @augments bigshot.VRRenderer
 22  */
 23 bigshot.CSS3DVRRenderer = function (_container) {
 24     this.container = _container;
 25     this.canvasOrigin = document.createElement ("div");
 26     
 27     this.canvasOrigin.style.WebkitTransformOrigin = "0px 0px 0px";
 28     this.canvasOrigin.style.WebkitTransformStyle = "preserve-3d";
 29     this.canvasOrigin.style.WebkitPerspective= "600px";
 30     
 31     this.canvasOrigin.style.position = "relative";
 32     this.canvasOrigin.style.left = "50%";
 33     this.canvasOrigin.style.top = "50%";
 34     
 35     this.container.appendChild (this.canvasOrigin);
 36     
 37     this.viewport = document.createElement ("div");
 38     this.viewport.style.WebkitTransformOrigin = "0px 0px 0px";
 39     this.viewport.style.WebkitTransformStyle = "preserve-3d";
 40     this.canvasOrigin.appendChild (this.viewport);
 41     
 42     this.world = document.createElement ("div");
 43     this.world.style.WebkitTransformOrigin = "0px 0px 0px";
 44     this.world.style.WebkitTransformStyle = "preserve-3d";
 45     this.viewport.appendChild (this.world);
 46     
 47     this.browser.removeAllChildren (this.world);
 48     
 49     this.view = null;
 50     
 51     this.mvMatrix = new bigshot.TransformStack ();
 52     
 53     this.yaw = 0;
 54     this.pitch = 0;
 55     this.fov = 0;
 56     this.pMatrix = new bigshot.TransformStack ();
 57     
 58     this.onresize = function () {
 59     };
 60     
 61     this.viewportSize = null;
 62 };
 63 
 64 bigshot.CSS3DVRRenderer.prototype = {
 65     browser : new bigshot.Browser (),
 66     
 67     dispose : function () {
 68         
 69     },
 70     
 71     createTileCache : function (onloaded, onCacheInit, parameters) {
 72         return new bigshot.ImageVRTileCache (onloaded, onCacheInit, parameters);
 73     },
 74     
 75     createTexturedQuadScene : function () {
 76         return new bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuadScene (this.world, 128, this.view);
 77     },
 78     
 79     createTexturedQuad : function (p, u, v, texture) {
 80         return new bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuad (p, u, v, texture);
 81     },
 82     
 83     getElement : function () {
 84         return this.container;
 85     },
 86     
 87     supportsUpdate : function () {
 88         return false;
 89     },
 90     
 91     getViewportWidth : function () {
 92         if (this.viewportSize) {
 93             return this.viewportSize.w;
 94         }
 95         return this.browser.getElementSize (this.container).w;
 96     },
 97     
 98     getViewportHeight : function () {
 99         if (this.viewportSize) {
100             return this.viewportSize.h;
101         }
102         return this.browser.getElementSize (this.container).h;
103     },
104     
105     onresize : function () {
106     },
107     
108     resize : function (w, h) {
109         if (this.container.style.width != "") {
110             this.container.style.width = w + "px";
111         }
112         if (this.container.style.height != "") {
113             this.container.style.height = h + "px";
114         }
115     },
116     
117     beginRender : function (rotation, fov, translation, rotationOffsets) {
118         this.viewportSize = this.browser.getElementSize (this.container);
119         
120         this.yaw = rotation.y;
121         this.pitch = rotation.p;
122         this.fov = fov;
123         
124         var halfFovInRad = 0.5 * fov * Math.PI / 180;
125         var halfHeight = this.getViewportHeight () / 2;
126         var perspectiveDistance = halfHeight / Math.tan (halfFovInRad);
127         
128         this.mvMatrix.reset ();
129         
130         this.view = translation;
131         this.mvMatrix.translate (this.view);
132         
133         
134         this.mvMatrix.rotateZ (rotationOffsets.r);
135         this.mvMatrix.rotateX (rotationOffsets.p);
136         this.mvMatrix.rotateY (rotationOffsets.y);
137         
138         this.mvMatrix.rotateY (this.yaw);
139         this.mvMatrix.rotateX (this.pitch);
140         
141         
142         this.pMatrix.reset ();
143         this.pMatrix.perspective (this.fov, this.getViewportWidth () / this.getViewportHeight (), 0.1, 100.0);
144         
145         this.mvpMatrix = this.pMatrix.matrix ().multiply (this.mvMatrix.matrix ());
146         
147         this.canvasOrigin.style.WebkitPerspective= perspectiveDistance + "px";
148         
149         for (var i = this.world.children.length - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
150             this.world.children[i].inWorld = 1;
151         }
152         
153         this.world.style.WebkitTransform = 
154             "rotate3d(1,0,0," + (-rotation.p) + "deg) " +
155             "rotate3d(0,1,0," + rotation.y + "deg) " +
156             "rotate3d(0,1,0," + (rotationOffsets.y) + "deg) " +
157             "rotate3d(1,0,0," + (-rotationOffsets.p) + "deg) " +
158             "rotate3d(0,0,1," + (-rotationOffsets.r) + "deg) ";
159         this.world.style.WebkitTransformStyle = "preserve-3d";
160         this.world.style.WebKitBackfaceVisibility = "hidden";
161         
162         this.viewport.style.WebkitTransform = 
163             "translateZ(" + perspectiveDistance + "px)";
164     },
165     
166     endRender : function () {
167         for (var i = this.world.children.length - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
168             var child = this.world.children[i];
169             if (!child.inWorld || child.inWorld != 2) {
170                 delete child.inWorld;
171                 this.world.removeChild (child);
172             }
173         }
174         
175         this.viewportSize = null;
176     }    
177 };
178 
179 bigshot.Object.extend (bigshot.CSS3DVRRenderer, bigshot.AbstractVRRenderer);
180 bigshot.Object.validate ("bigshot.CSS3DVRRenderer", bigshot.VRRenderer);
181
